Source.Name: catatonit
Source.Description: A container init that is so simple it's effectively brain-dead. This is a rewrite of initrs in C, because we found that it is not possible to statically compile Rust binaries without using musl. That was, in turn, a reimplementation of other container inits like tini and dumb-init.

Package.Name: catatonit
Package.Description: A container init that is so simple it's effectively brain-dead.
